original_text: Queen Esther was lying down on a bed. Haman threw himself down beside her. At that moment, the king returned from the garden. The king shouted, ‘What is this man doing? He even attacks the queen when she is with me in my palace!’
korean_text: 왕이 후원으로부터 잔치 자리에 돌아오니 하만이 에스더가 앉은 걸상 위에 엎드렸거늘 왕이 이르되 저가 궁중 내 앞에서 왕후를 강간까지 하고자 하는가 하니 이 말이 왕의 입에서 나오매 무리가 하만의 얼굴을 싸더라

sentences.original_text: Queen Esther was lying down on a bed
Haman threw himself down beside her
the king returned from the garden
when she is with me in my palace!'
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 나와 함께 나의 궁전에 있을 때에!'
